languages.text: "Сенешаль Версериан один из немногих, на чьи цвета приятно смотреть". {n}Строгий взгляд Кассии чуть теплеет.{/n} "Когда сенешаль говорит, вокруг разрастается кристальная прозрачность неба. Когда гневится — сгущаются синие тучи. Ну а в редкие минуты радости чистый отсвет розового заката лелеет душу тех, кто его окружает. Из всей вашей свиты, Лорд-капитан, я бы доверила свою жизнь лишь ему".

traits.locale_text: "Сенешаль Версериан один из немногих, на чьи цвета приятно смотреть". {n}Строгий взгляд Кассии чуть теплеет.{/n} "Когда Сенешаль говорит, вокруг разрастается кристальная прозрачность неба. Когда гневится — сгущаются синие тучи. Ну а в редкие минуты радости чистый отсвет розового заката лелеет душу тех, кто его окружает. Из всей вашей свиты, Лорд-капитан, я бы доверила свою жизнь лишь ему".

languages.text: "Seneschal Werserian is among the few whose colours are a pleasure to look at." {n}Cassia's stern gaze grows a little warmer.{/n} "Whenever the Seneschal speaks, heavenly crystal clarity spreads around him. And whenever he is angered, dark-blue clouds condense over him. And in his rare moments of joy, a pure gleam of sunset pink caresses the souls of those near him. Out of your entire retinue, Lord Captain, he is the only one I would trust with my life."
languages.original_text: "Сенешаль Версериан один из немногих, на чьи цвета приятно смотреть". {n}Строгий взгляд Кассии чуть теплеет.{/n} "Когда сенешаль говорит, вокруг разрастается кристальная прозрачность неба. Когда гневится — сгущаются синие тучи. Ну а в редкие минуты радости чистый отсвет розового заката лелеет душу тех, кто его окружает. Из всей вашей свиты, Лорд-капитан, я бы доверила свою жизнь лишь ему".

traits.locale_text: "Seneschal Werserian is among the few whose colours are a pleasure to look at." {n}Cassia's stern gaze grows a little warmer.{/n} "Whenever the Seneschal speaks, a heavenly crystal limpidity spreads around him. And whenever he is angered, dark-blue clouds condense over him. And in his rare moments of joy, a pure gleam of sunset pink caresses the souls of those near him. Out of your entire retinue, Lord Captain, he is the only one I would trust with my life."

"Seneschal Werserian is among the few whose colours are a pleasure to look at." {n}Cassia's stern gaze grows a little warmer.{/n} "Whenever the Seneschal speaks, a heavenly crystal limpidity spreads around him. And whenever he is angered, dark-blue clouds condense over him. And in his rare moments of joy, a pure gleam of sunset pink caresses the souls of those near him. Out of your entire retinue, Lord Captain, he is the only one I would trust with my life."

languages.text: “只有少数几个人的颜色令人赏心悦目，而韦尔森总领就是其中之一。”{n}卡西娅严肃的目光变得缓和了些。{/n}“每当总领说话时，他身边就会散发着晶莹剔透的光芒，仿佛来自天堂的水晶。而每当他被激怒时，他的身上就会凝聚着深蓝色的云雾。而当他偶尔感到喜悦时，他身上会绽放着如同夕阳般纯洁的粉色光芒，抚慰着他身边每个人的灵魂。舰长大人，在你所有的随行人员之中，他是唯一一个我愿意用生命来信任的人。”
languages.original_text: "Seneschal Werserian is among the few whose colours are a pleasure to look at." {n}Cassia's stern gaze grows a little warmer.{/n} "Whenever the Seneschal speaks, heavenly crystal clarity spreads around him. And whenever he is angered, dark-blue clouds condense over him. And in his rare moments of joy, a pure gleam of sunset pink caresses the souls of those near him. Out of your entire retinue, Lord Captain, he is the only one I would trust with my life."

traits.locale_text: “只有少数几个人的颜色令人赏心悦目，而韦尔森总领就是其中之一。”{n}卡西娅严肃的目光变得缓和了些。{/n}“每当总领说话时，他身边就会散发着晶莹剔透的光芒，仿佛来自天堂的水晶。而每当他被激怒时，他的身上就会凝聚着深蓝色的云雾。而当他偶尔感到喜悦时，他身上会绽放着如同夕阳般纯洁的粉色光芒，抚慰着他身边每个人的灵魂。舰长大人，在你所有的随行人员之中，他是唯一一个我愿意用生命来信任的人。”

languages.original_text: "Seneschal Werserian is among the few whose colours are a pleasure to look at." {n}Cassia's stern gaze grows a little warmer.{/n} "Whenever the Seneschal speaks, heavenly crystal clarity spreads around him. And whenever he is angered, dark-blue clouds condense over him. And in his rare moments of joy, a pure gleam of sunset pink caresses the souls of those near him. Out of your entire retinue, Lord Captain, he is the only one I would trust with my life."

languages.text: «El Senescal Werserian es uno de los pocos cuyos colores son placenteros a la vista». {n}La severa mirada de Cassia se vuelve un poco más amable.{/n} «Cuando el Senescal habla, una claridad cristalina y celestial se extiende a su alrededor. Su furia condensa nubes de color azul oscuro. Y las pocas veces que lo he visto alegrarse, un ocaso del rosa más puro acaricia las almas de cuantos le rodean. Lord Capitán, de todo su séquito es el único al que le confiaría mi vida».
languages.original_text: "Seneschal Werserian is among the few whose colours are a pleasure to look at." {n}Cassia's stern gaze grows a little warmer.{/n} "Whenever the Seneschal speaks, heavenly crystal clarity spreads around him. And whenever he is angered, dark-blue clouds condense over him. And in his rare moments of joy, a pure gleam of sunset pink caresses the souls of those near him. Out of your entire retinue, Lord Captain, he is the only one I would trust with my life."

traits.locale_text: «El Senescal Werserian es uno de los pocos cuyos colores son placenteros a la vista». {n}La severa mirada de Cassia se vuelve un poco más amable.{/n} «Cuando el Senescal habla, una claridad cristalina y celestial se extiende a su alrededor. Su furia condensa nubes de color azul oscuro. Y las pocas veces que lo he visto alegrarse, un ocaso del rosa más puro acaricia las almas de cuantos le rodean. Lord Capitán, de todo su séquito es el único al que le confiaría mi vida».

languages.text: 「ウェルザリアン家令長は、見ていて楽しくなるような色彩を持つ数少ない人物の一人です」{n}カシアの厳しいまなざしが少し温かみを帯びる。{/n}「家令長が話すときはいつも、天の水晶のような透明感が周囲に広がるのです。そして彼が怒ると、紺青の雲が立ち込める。まれに喜びを感じる瞬間には、サンセットピンクの純粋な輝きが彼の近くにいる人々の魂を撫でます。ロード・キャプテン、あなたの随員の中で、私が命をかけて信頼できるのは彼だけなのです」
languages.original_text: "Seneschal Werserian is among the few whose colours are a pleasure to look at." {n}Cassia's stern gaze grows a little warmer.{/n} "Whenever the Seneschal speaks, heavenly crystal clarity spreads around him. And whenever he is angered, dark-blue clouds condense over him. And in his rare moments of joy, a pure gleam of sunset pink caresses the souls of those near him. Out of your entire retinue, Lord Captain, he is the only one I would trust with my life."

traits.locale_text: 「ウェルザリアン家令長は、見ていて楽しくなるような色彩を持つ数少ない人物の一人です」{n}カシアの厳しいまなざしが少し温かみを帯びる。{/n}「家令長が話すときはいつも、天の水晶のような透明感が周囲に広がるのです。そして彼が怒ると、紺青の雲が立ち込める。まれに喜びを感じる瞬間には、サンセットピンクの純粋な輝きが彼の近くにいる人々の魂を撫でます。ロード・キャプテン、あなたの随員の中で、私が命をかけて信頼できるのは彼だけなのです」

languages.text: "Truchsess Werserian zählt zu den Wenigen, deren Farben zu betrachten eine Freude ist." {n}Cassias strenger Blick wird etwas wärmer.{/n} "Wenn der Truchsess spricht, verbreitet sich himmlische, kristallene Klarheit um ihn herum. Und wenn er zornig ist, ziehen sich dunkelblaue Wolken über ihm zusammen. Und in seinen seltenen Augenblicken der Freude streichelt ein Strahl im reinsten Rosa des Sonnenuntergangs die Seelen aller in seiner Nähe. Aus Eurem gesamten Gefolge, Lord Captain, ist er der Einzige, dem ich mein Leben anvertrauen wurde."
languages.original_text: "Seneschal Werserian is among the few whose colours are a pleasure to look at." {n}Cassia's stern gaze grows a little warmer.{/n} "Whenever the Seneschal speaks, heavenly crystal clarity spreads around him. And whenever he is angered, dark-blue clouds condense over him. And in his rare moments of joy, a pure gleam of sunset pink caresses the souls of those near him. Out of your entire retinue, Lord Captain, he is the only one I would trust with my life."

traits.locale_text: "Truchsess Werserian zählt zu den Wenigen, deren Farben zu betrachten eine Freude ist." {n}Cassias strenger Blick wird etwas wärmer.{/n} "Wenn der Truchsess spricht, verbreitet sich himmlische, kristallene Klarheit um ihn herum. Und wenn er zornig ist, ziehen sich dunkelblaue Wolken über ihm zusammen. Und in seinen seltenen Augenblicken der Freude streichelt ein Strahl im reinsten Rosa des Sonnenuntergangs die Seelen aller in seiner Nähe. Aus Eurem gesamten Gefolge, Lord Captain, ist er der Einzige, dem ich mein Leben anvertrauen wurde."

languages.text: {n}Le regard austère de Cassia s'adoucit.{/n} « Le sénéchal Werserian est l'une des rares personnes à être entourée de couleurs agréables à regarder. Lorsqu'il parle, il est enveloppé d'une clarté cristalline, presque divine. Lorsqu'il est en colère, des nuages bleu foncé s'amassent autour de lui. Et dans les rares moments où il ressent de la joie, la douce lueur rosée du soleil couchant vient caresser les âmes de ceux qui l'entourent. De tout votre entourage, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, c'est le seul à qui je confierais aveuglément ma vie. »
languages.original_text: "Seneschal Werserian is among the few whose colours are a pleasure to look at." {n}Cassia's stern gaze grows a little warmer.{/n} "Whenever the Seneschal speaks, heavenly crystal clarity spreads around him. And whenever he is angered, dark-blue clouds condense over him. And in his rare moments of joy, a pure gleam of sunset pink caresses the souls of those near him. Out of your entire retinue, Lord Captain, he is the only one I would trust with my life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard austère de Cassia s'adoucit.{/n} « Le sénéchal Werserian est l'une des rares personnes à être entourée de couleurs agréables à regarder. Lorsqu'il parle, il est enveloppé d'une clarté cristalline, presque divine. Lorsqu'il est en colère, des nuages bleu foncé s'amassent autour de lui. Et dans les rares moments où il ressent de la joie, la douce lueur rosée du soleil couchant vient caresser les âmes de ceux qui l'entourent. De tout votre entourage, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, c'est le seul à qui je confierais aveuglément ma vie. »

languages.text: "Renklerine bakınca zevk aldığım nadir insanlardan biri de Seneşal Werserian." {n}Cassia'nın sert bakışları biraz olsun yumuşuyor.{/n} "Seneşal her konuştuğunda, etrafına billur gibi bir ışık yayılıyor. Ne zaman öfkelense çevresinde lacivert bulutlar toplanıyor. Nadiren neşelendiği anlarda da yanındaki ruhları şafak pembesi bir ışıltı sarıyor. Maiyetindeki onca kişi arasından canımı emanet edeceğim tek kişi o olurdu Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "Seneschal Werserian is among the few whose colours are a pleasure to look at." {n}Cassia's stern gaze grows a little warmer.{/n} "Whenever the Seneschal speaks, heavenly crystal clarity spreads around him. And whenever he is angered, dark-blue clouds condense over him. And in his rare moments of joy, a pure gleam of sunset pink caresses the souls of those near him. Out of your entire retinue, Lord Captain, he is the only one I would trust with my life."

traits.locale_text: "Renklerine bakınca zevk aldığım nadir insanlardan biri de Seneşal Werserian." {n}Cassia'nın sert bakışları biraz yumuşuyor.{/n} "Seneşal her konuştuğunda, etrafına billur gibi bir ışık yayılıyor. Ne zaman öfkelense, etrafına lacivert bulutlar toplanıyor. Nadiren neşelendiği anlarda da yanındaki ruhları şafak pembesi bir ışıltı sarıyor. Maiyetindeki onca kişi arasından canımı emanet edeceğim tek kişi o olurdu Lord Kaptan."
